outline:
1. to bare, polish, make smooth or bald or bare
    1. (Qal)
      1. to make bare
      2. to scour, polish
    2. (Niphal) to be made bald
kjv_def: bright, furbish, (have his) hair (be) fallen off, peeled, pluck off (hair).
strongs_def: to polish; by implication, to make bald (the head), to gall (the shoulder); also, to sharpen
